overview:
Gold Events - Greater Boston’s Premier Bar Mitzvah and Bat Mitzvah event planner / party organizer-serving clients in Massachusetts (MA) and Rhode Island (RI). With over 15 years of event planning experience, Bonnie Gold has earned a first class professional reputation as an experienced and creative event planner. Bonnie’s high standards, organizational ability and artistic flair, combine to make Gold Events, a leading company in the Bar/Bat Mitzvah event planning industry in the Boston area and beyond. Bonnie Gold and her team are people that you can really trust in planning your simcha.

Gold Events offers its clients a “one-stop-shop solution, incorporating every aspect of event planning and destination management within its portfolio of trusted suppliers. Our aim is to merge your vision and our experience into an event that showcases impeccable style and creativity.” Whatever the occasion, whether its a Corporate event, a Fundraiser or Non-Profit Event, a Bar/Bat Mitzvah party or Wedding function, Gold Events will create a custom design statement that everyone will be talking about. No job is too big or too small for the event planning team at Gold Events. At your event, Gold Events will arrange and coordinate every possible type of service or vendor that you will need. This includes: Gourmet Caterering, Linen Rentals, Tent Rental, Florist, Photographer, Videographer, Live Music and DJ, Lighting, Transportation, Invitations, Novelties and Favors, Centerpieces and props, and Balloon decor.

Gold Events has satisfied clients in the Greater Boston Area (Metro West, North Shore, South Shore, Cape Cod) Brookline, Sharon, Providence, Newport and in many of the neighboring towns in Massachusetts MA, Rhode Island RI and Connecticut CT. Why not let us plan your next simcha?

Whether, you need a Bar Mitzvah planner, Bat Mitzvah planner, Corporate Event planner, or just a party planner, Gold Events will ensure that they exceed your expectations and make your simcha truly memorable. If you fancy a party with a sports theme, why not have it at Gillette Stadium, the home of the New England Patriots. If you are planning a surprise birthday party for your spouse or parent, a fundraising event, a Non-Profit event, or a Corporate team-building event, Gold Events can help. At Gold Events “nothing is too much trouble for your simcha!” To let us know the details of your forthcoming event, please complete this form, or e-mail Bonnie Gold. Otherwise please call us on (401)-724-5103 or (401) 556-8922. Subscribe to Bonnie’s Blog- When it comes to Event Planning, can we talk?
